name: Duel for the Dead
description:
Duel for the Dead! Face the enemy to be the first to take the "package" from the hospital. Try to slow down your rival as much as possible and plan your way wisely. SpainGameDevJam II This is a game developed for the second SpainGameDevJam. Enjoy! Thanks for playing and, please, leave your feedback in a comment!!! Development team This game was developed by:
